option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filter out data with values of lag-zero power less than minpwr.
filename of the fitacf format file.
the input file is in the fit format.
filename of the fit format file.

synopsis.p: Creates a cfit format file from either a fit or fitacf format file.

description.p: Creates a cfit format file from either a fit or fitacf format file.
The cfit file is written to standard output

example.description: Create a cfit format file from the fit file named "20040830.gbr.fit", the output file is called "20040830.gbr.cfit".
Create a cfit format file from the fitacf file named "20040830.gbr.fitacf", the output file is called "20040830.gbr.cfit".
